text: @realDonaldTrump Nice try Donald. People don’t FEAR mail ballots like they FEAR how your coronavirus response and disregard for medical and science experts is gradually hurting us all. We could have reopened safely with proper administrations support and messaging BUT...you now hurt the economy..

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
